The One With All The Questions


Monica just can't believe that Joey thinks he and Chandler know her and Rachel better than the other way around.


But how well do you know the iconic TV show 'Friends'?


Ross has made up some questions for you (it's not like he has a job, or a child, or a life of his own!).


The test is ready.


Challenge accepted?


Hit 'PLAY' to begin
or select 'HELP'
if you need instructions.

"What's complicated?!
You spin the Wheel of Mayhem,
to go up the Ladder of Chance.
You go past the Mud Hut,
through the Rainbow Ring,
to get to the Golden Monkey.
You yank his tail and boom,
You're in Paradise Pond!"

"Yeah, all that's gone. It's basically just a simple question and answer game now"

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Select your desired difficulty - either Easy, Medium, or Hard.
  • Each level of difficulty contains 10 questions.
  • Read each question and select the answer you think is correct.
  • Answer all the questions and receive your score.
  • Follow the score count below the question box to keep track of your score as you go along.
  • Select the Menu at the top of the screen at any time to access a reminder of these instructions, or to start a new game.
